title: 704: BITCOIN DECEMBER CLOSING PRICE PREDICTIONS!!!! YOU CAN NOW GET PAID IN BTC TO USE TWITTER!!!!
description:
Quantitative analyst PlanB believes Bitcoin will hit a 6-figure price by the end of the year despite the recent crypto meltdown.

PlanB says BTC will close at or above $100K in December, according to his stock-to-flow model.

However, based on logarithmic regression or the time model, the quantitative analyst says the flagship cryptocurrency could fall to $30,000.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
